tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_financing_instrument AS SELECT f.amp_activity_id, val.category_value AS name, f.financing_instr_category_value AS amp_modality_id FROM amp_funding f, amp_category_value val WHERE (f.financing_instr_category_value = val.id) UNION SELECT eu.amp_activity_id, val.category_value AS name, eu_con.financing_instr_category_value AS amp_modality_id FROM amp_eu_activity eu, amp_eu_activity_contributions eu_con, amp_category_value val WHERE ((eu_con.eu_activity_id = eu.id) AND (eu_con.financing_instr_category_value = val.id)) ORDER BY 1, 2;;;
